short_summary: Procurement for dix-neuf (19) Walk Behind Floor Scrubber with a new equipement for Edmonton Garrison.
description: Upgrade and replacement the existing equipment with nineteen (19) electric, walk behind, automatic 18 inch floor scrubber, update and install, Guarantee to have equipment deliver on or before 2023-03-31.  Replaced the damaged or failed equipment to ensure the large scale installation can move forward without delays throught and continous functioning and meeting the requirement.  Maintain and continue to expand provision and guarantee a qualitative, Legal and Valid equipment supply.
duration_in_months: What can we take as period for adjust Base bid and Individual bid for contracting entity
full_summary:
================+

**Notice: Walk Behind Floor Scrubber**
-------------------------------------

**Reference:** WS3735929866-Doc3786887076

**Amendment Number:** 2

**Publication Date:** 2022-12-12

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-20T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

**Amendment Date:** 2022-12-30

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

The Departement of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the procurement of quantity 19 electric walk behind floor scrubbers. The project aims to upgrade and replace existing equipment at the Edmonton Garrison Rations and Quarters Section.

**Scope:**

* The contractor must provide 19 electric walk behind floor scrubbers with a cleaning path of 18 inches
* The equipment must be automatic and self-contained
* Delivery is required to the Edmonton Garrison Rations and Quarters Section

**Selection Criteria:**

* The selection will be based on the lowest price

**Trade Agreements:**

* This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**

* Alberta

**Regions of Delivery:**

* Alberta

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Nancy Baessler (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:nancy.baessler@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not Available
* Fax: Not Available
* Address: Not Available

**Notice URL:**

* http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14872928?extsite=MTQ4NzI5MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Please note that the closing time has been amended to 2023-01-20 at 14:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive. The end user of this equipment is the Department of National Defence (DND).  by the expected end date of 2023-03-31.  by the expected end date of 2023-03-31. the contractor is expected to deliver the equipment to the Edmonton Garrison Rations and Quarters Section.         by the expected end date of 2023-03-31.  the contractor is expected to deliver the equipment to the Edmonton Garrison Rations and Quarters Section
